metadata.title: DPM/FM departs to Kabul on an official visit

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 19 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Saturday departed to Kabul for his first official visit to Afghanistan. aThe DPM/FM is leading a high-level delegation, comprising of the Special Representative for Afghanistan, Amb. Sadiq Khan, SAPM Tariq Bajwa, federal secretaries for commerce, railways and Interior, as well as other senior officialsa, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
